subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: File from tonight--Bruce
author: Robin Searcy Henson
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_014A_01C8682D.E21A4A90
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

I very much value and appreciate everyone participating in this forum.   My=
 selfish motive in wanting to contact the other side is my hope to hear fro=
m loved ones who have passed.  I couldn't admit this a couple of years ago =
because the idea of being contacted by my dead parents terrified me.  Now I=
 long for it.  I believe guardian angels have intervened on my behalf in th=
e past and continue to watch over me.  I've had mystic experiences during t=
imes of crisis that make me know a spiritual world exists.  How wonderful i=
t must be to hear their voices first hand!  I'll remind myself every day ne=
ver to take any of what happens for granted.

Robin

 
  ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
  From: bruce halliday<mailto:paranormalinvestigating@hotmail.c=
om> 
  To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com<mailto:evp-itc@yahoogroups.com> 
  Sent:=
 Monday, February 04, 2008 6:58 AM
  Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: File from t=
onight--Bruce


  Robin,
   
  I very much appreciate your comments and con=
fidence in me, but at the end of the day I'm no different than anyone else.=

  The only thing that may set me apart from some of the other researchers =
here is that I have a bit more experience and 
  being disabled allows me a=
 lot more time for research. I am always willing and hopefully able to help=
 new researchers with 
  my advice and knowledge I have gained through expe=
rience. But my ideology is not the end all explanation or truth of box rese=
arch
  all opinions here are valuable and deserving of consideration and at=
tention.
   
  As for your question, the fact that I am blessed enough to r=
eceive a fairly good level of communication I believe is based once 
  agai=
n on the relationship I have built with my tech/guides and the synchronizat=
ion of energy we have developed.
  The level of communication we are at I b=
elieve is only the very tip of the iceberg. My goal in "MY" research is to =
reach a level of communication that 
  allows us to speak easily and freely=
 with our spirit friends in a fluid and continual fashion as if having a pl=
easant telephone conversation.
   
  The gist of the messages I am receivin=
g now are directed toward our spirit counterparts achieving the same goal. =
It is already a comfort to me to know they are there and I have had the opp=
ortunity to speak with close family members and friends that have crossed o=
ver. And also recently Ms. Sarah Estep who has made the transition and is b=
eginning to work now on the
  spirit side to further the communication. Any=
 information I receive from the spirits I recognise to be friends is invalu=
able. Something as simple as a yes or no answer to a direct question that h=
as just been asked is a small miracle in and of itself. considering how it =
was attained and where it is from. Most researchers I think after a certain=
 amount of time succumb to the human flaw of complacency and take for grant=
ed that when they turn a box on they will receive communication. They loose=
 site of the fact that this communication is a precious gift to mankind and=
 eventually will change the way we perceive life and death.
   
  I don't k=
now if my thinking or opinions are lucid or the rantings of a mad man, I'm =
sure a lot of people would say both. For what it is worth this is how I bel=
ieve on the questions you asked.
  for better or worse.
   
  Bruce




  B=
ruce Halliday 



  <http://free-paranormalinvestigating.com/%3C/div%3E%3C/=
div%3E%3Cp%20/%3E%3Cdiv%20class=3D>



------------------------------------=
----------------------------------------
    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
  =
  From: MudPuddleFarm@...
    Date: Sun, 3 Feb 2008 18:35:14 -0800
    =
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: File from tonight--Bruce


    It's always refre=
shing to read your input Bruce.  Funny thing is, I recognize Mike and Lisa =
on your recordings too.  I'm aware that they are acting as facilitators and=
 guardians, that they are consistent in their ability to use varied modes o=
f communication, and that their contact appears to be purposeful, as compar=
ed to so much that seems to have no rhyme or reason.  

    As a newbie I'm=
 admittedly intimidated by and in awe of the results you more experienced r=
esearchers are accomplishing.  What I find most awesome is that everyone ca=
n have different methods, belief systems and opinions and come together in =
one forum to share and learn from one another.  I feel so lucky to have fou=
nd you!  Bruce, your ability to hear and accurately repeat my one posted EV=
P is the only validation I've personally ever received that makes me know I=
'm involved in something real and life altering.  I'm supposed to be here! =
 I think a big part of my education will continue to come from the knowledg=
e and experience you all are willing to keep sharing.  It's also a fact tha=
t each of us needs to find his/her own individual truth.  

    I'm still t=
roubled by the possibility that we could be pawns in Someone Else's science=
 experiment.  I can sense Frank's cynicism related to the messages being me=
aningless and the messengers being untrustworthy.  In your own case, what i=
s the goal?  Is the fact that you've established communication and continue=
 to communicate enough?  Are we hoping to gain invaluable information from =
our guides, or just to have the comfort of knowing they are there?  

    T=
his is the week I've promised myself to start doing sessions with the Radio=
 Shack hacks!  

    Robin





    hoogroups.com<mailto:myself.@yahoogroup=
s.com> 
      Sent: Sunday, February 03, 2008 6:25 AM
      Subject: RE: [E=
VP-ITC] Re: File from tonight


      Robin,
       
      I agree with Ste=
ve on a couple of points. First let me say that I
      do believe that we =
all have a "technician/guide/guardian" call them what you
      may. but I =
usually call them by the names they introduced themselves by.
       
     =
 I know for a fact through many, many, many box sessions that when I turn
 =
     a box on, could be Frank's box or the minibox or the RS 470 does not m=
atter which.
       
      The same two entities will come through immediat=
ely, So much so now, that I do not even ask for conformation that
      it =
is in fact them. I recognise their individual voice patterns. I have built =
a solid relationship with these two spirits
      I know as mike and Lisa s=
o much so that I have even gotten to know their individual personalities.
 =
      
      There are other newer researchers here that will attest to the=
 fact that when they where doing their first sessions
      I had asked my =
two "Friends" Mike and Lisa to assist in getting them started and invariabl=
y the spirits that came 
      through to these new researchers during thei=
r first sessions identified themselves as Mike and Lisa.
       
      Stev=
e says he does not turn on his box and use them as a crutch, that is not en=
tirely true. I had done research 
      very closely with Steve until recen=
tly and I would venture to say that 99% if not every session he starts with=
 "Mike & Lisa
      are you available to talk with me" 
       
      Also =
I don't consider working with my technicians as using them as a crutch, The=
y would not allow that.
      They are not there like butlers at our beckon=
ed call when we feel they may be of some use.
      Quite the opposite, wit=
hout them we would get no communication at all, they are allowing us the ho=
nor of receiving this 
      celestial communication. They are the moderato=
rs, facilitators and generators of all we hear and send to and from the spi=
rit realm.
      And they also stand as guards and protectors to do the bes=
t they can to keep us from being deceived or taken down a dark path.
      =
 
      Some here wait for others to state an opinion and then tend to agre=
e with that opinion no matter what they have experienced to be true.
      =
 
      Robin, my advice to you as a new researcher in this field. Form you=
r own beliefs through your experience and research.
      Listen and learn =
from others but do not let what you believe to be true or not, be swayed by=
 popular opinion.
       
      Bruce




      Bruce Halliday 


      <ht=
tp://free-paranormalinvestigating.com/%3C/div%3E%3C/div%3E%3Cp%20/%3E%3Cdiv=
%20class=3D>

        To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
        From: MudPuddleF=
arm@...
        Date: Sat, 2 Feb 2008 21:42:09 -0800
        Subject: R=
e: [EVP-ITC] Re: File from tonight


        Steve,

        I certainly ap=
preciate your thoughts.  In the back of my mind is always the question of w=
hether we are being Deceived.  Just for the sake of argument, is it POSSIBL=
E we're being manipulated by something evil?  I'm not frightened, and I won=
't stop my own research (the negative stuff just makes me more determined),=
 but my mind does go there sometimes.  I hope that along with developing my=
 "ear" I can acquire the gift of discernment.

        Robin


          --=
--- Original Message ----- 
          From: Steve Hultay<mailto:urkel23@aol=
.com> 
          To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com=
> 
          Sent: Saturday, February 02, 2008 8:57 PM
          Subject: [=
EVP-ITC] Re: File from tonight:


          Robin,

          If i may add =
my thoughts on this: There is no concrete evidence of 
          who or wha=
t comes through is what they say they are. Technicians i 
          have fo=
und were used to get you up and running and i only now call on 
          t=
hem if i need assistance. I don't turn the boxes on and ask for 
          =
them like a crutch, i conduct my session and if i need help they will 
    =
      supply it to me if needed. I think the whole idea is to find out who =

          we are communicating with, maybe we will never really know for s=
ure 
          but i still try and find out as best as i can. 

          -=
Steve H.

          --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogrou=
ps.com>, "Robin Searcy Henson" 
          <MudPuddleFarm@...> wrote:
      =
    >
          > Hi Frank, 
          > 
          > When you mention bein=
g distrustful of what comes through the boxes, 
          are you saying yo=
u're skeptical of the "technicians" being who they 
          say they are?=
 Not trying to open another can of worms here, just 
          wanting to c=
ontinue learning from your experience and research. I 
          get what y=
ou're saying about becoming obsessive with the sessions. 
          I've pr=
obably asked you this a half dozen times over the last couple 
          of=
 years, but who or what do YOU think you're/we're communicating 
          =
with?
          > 
          > Robin
          > 
          > 
          > =
----- Original Message ----- 
          > From: purplespacefriend<mailto:pu=
rplealiengirl@...>

bject: [EVP-ITC] Re: File from tonight
          > 
          > 
          =
> Have ya tried EVPmaker? It is based on that random principle, and 
      =
    > predates the boxes.
          > 
          > I've heard this stuff be=
fore, about random being the best, and I 
          > have to disaggree. I =
also think it unwise to spend every waking 
          > moment doing sessio=
ns. I think it creates that expectation, and 
          > perhaps desperati=
on to make contact, and I would tend not to 
          trust 
          > w=
hat comes through. 
          > 
          > I don't trust some of this stu=
ff because I have yet get any 
          > meaningful assistence with the b=
oxes from the so called 
          technicians. 
          > All I ever got=
 was a telepathic "suggestion" to use the echo 
          boxes. 
         =
 > Everything else was a assemblage of stuff I had worked on in hte 
      =
    past 
          > to solve the problem of "what else could I use". 
   =
       > 
          > I hate to see yet another go down the road of "this i=
s the 
          onlyest 
          > way". 
          > 
          > Frank=
-S
          >

        is always the question of whether we are being Deceived=

        something evil?  I'm not frightened, and I won=
't stop my own 
        research (the negative stuff just makes me more det=
ermined), but my mind 
        does go there sometimes.  I hope that a=
long with developing my 
        "ear" I can acquire the gift of disce=
rnment.</DIV>
